720939f.text:
Lexington Avenue, east side, from 28th to 29th Streets. Chester A. Arthur, President of the United States from 1881 to 1885, died in No. 123, which in this photograph has been remodeled for a store on the ground floor, and is occupied by Meguire Brothers.
About 1925.
Brown Brothers, Photographers
/.2
